output_call: htmlWriteHeader

>>>
= Main: sub

<<<
<div id="header">
<h1>Main: sub</h1>
</div>

>>> Without space after separator
= Main:sub

<<< Without space after separator
<div id="header">
<h1>Main:sub</h1>
</div>

>>> With multiple separator after separator
= a: b: c

<<< With multiple separator after separator
<div id="header">
<h1>a: b: c</h1>
</div>

>>> With custom separator
:title-separator: x
= Mainx sub

<<< With custom separator
<div id="header">
<h1>Mainx sub</h1>
</div>
